summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. W-9, for the improvement of Pacific Avenue in the Former City of West Seattle, between the south line of Prince Street and the north line of South Street; in said city, by clearing, grubbing, grading, parking and constructing concrete sidewalks, thereon under Ordinance No. 182 of the former City of West Seattle and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
